Team Fortress 2 is dead...

The game is still holding up well in 2022. Even though the bots are here, The game has stayed the same since 2007. A nice, Classic FPS. The game runs very well on low-end PC's, So if you have a potato (like me) and want to play FPS games, Play this.
I hit 1000 Hours over a year ago, and even got a job (No Longer have that job) as an Administrator for a TF2 Community, And it was all thanks to my love for this game. 
I wont ever leave TF2, Its where I got friends, Had fun, Got a job, And this game saved me from suicide. I was so lonely in April 2020 when I stumbled across this game, I was ready to kill myself. 
One click on this game, And I was in heaven.
Thanks to this game I'm now a Twitch Streamer, Had about 300 Followers on Social Media (Banned.), And am now Elite Grade on my Casual Badge.
This game will be with me for the rest of my life, And If I die, Ill make sure I left TF2 Running.

Team Fortress 2 has without doubt been changed alot in recent years. People would say the game has gotten worse. I recently played it again and i liked it. Matchmaking has become more simple. People say that theres a lot of gamebreaking bots with offensive names, but so far i havent experienced that. 
Something i was never a fan of was, that you had to pay for tickets to play stuff like MvM. I get it, you get rewards and stuff, but its still kinda annoying. The price for cosmetic items is ridiculous as well. 7 euros for a sombrero ... :/

holy shit. WOW. This game is fucking phenomenal and you should go play it. I still havent mastered the game at 300 hours, thats how big the skill tree is. Good game 9/10

Well the game is fun when you get a lot of hours on it and start getting good at your class but its a bit rough at first. The cartoony graphics make it stand out and the partner taunts like conga and kazotsky kick leave lots of room for messing around. Overall it's fun and the trading system is good I you want to just make profit. But if you're gonna do that please play the game and try it out for yourself.

Simple and entertaiing class-based pvp. Gotta love the Valve physics.
The game was not that fun.
dios mio las mejores 450 horas de mi puta vida

Really fun solid game play , guns feels like guns , no cheap 2 polygon shotgun from COD 

WEAPONS--------
the weapons feel like they have allot of weight and kick to them

CLASSES---------
The Pyro--short ranged , fire damage , somewhat balanced (My main)

The Scout-- short-medium range , uses a shotgun , very fast , has lots of character

The Soldier-- any distance , fires a rocket launcher with 4 rockets , can rocket jump , very well made , and has lots of character

The Demoman--"what makes me a good demoman? WELL IF I WAS A BAD DEMOMAN I WOULDNT BE SIT'N HERE DISCUSIN IT NOW WOULD I ?" , short-medium range , uses a grenade launcher and on a direct hit deals allot of damage , can become a demoknight , probaby one of the best voice actors , has lots of character

The Heavy--"I am heavy weapons guy and this is my weapon" short-medium range, uses a minigun , with a medic he can tear a team in half , very well made , has lots of character

The Engineer--short-medium range , uses a sentry that can be upgraded to level 3 , can build a dispenser that gives ammo and heals team-mates , can equip the gunslinger to become a battle engie 

The Medic--"MEEEEEEEEEEEEDDDDDDDDDDDICCCCCCCCCC!!!!!!!" short ranged , uses a medi gun to heal team-mates , can equip the crusader's cross bow to heal from afar , has lots of character

The Sniper--"Snipers a good job mate" any range , uses a sniper rifle that has no recoil , stays far away from the fight to not be seen , but he is really easy to kill in close range , has lots of character 

The Spy--"I am the Spy" short-medium range , uses a revolver or a knife , the knife can back-stab it is an insta kill , uses a disguise kit to disguise as the enemy and trick them or just to back stab , uses a cloak, can go invisible to get out of sticky situation , has lots of character 




I love this game

A classic through the ages, may its reign be eternal.

I'm a bit late to the party, but I've always had an interest in this game ever since day one. I can happily say that after all these years, it still holds up with its fast-paced gameplay, stylised aesthetics, rich characters that are 100% quotable, and a decent variety of game modes available.

Тим фортресс 2 . Моя самая любимая игра . Эта игра подарит вам множество приятных моментов : первый бэкстаб , поиск мейн класса, убийство хэвимеда за скаута и др . Геймплейная особенность тф2 позволяет играть в нее бесконечно до посинения . Тут тебе и часовая катка на туфорте , разные оружия на разные классы, а когда тащишь за свой любимый класс просто вливаются тонны эндорфинов в мозг . Одним словом , это очень душевная игра ,с которой у меня связаны теплые воспоминания .
